item.title: Setanimation trouble
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“eagledude4, post:10, topic:348897”]Sorry but I don’t exactly know what you mean by that.
What other two lines?[/quote]

He means this:

[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dark Karma”)) {
for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
p.setAnimation(645);
}

sM("Welcome back Jordan!");
yell("Master Dark Karma has logged in");

}[/code]

Also, try startAnimation(int) instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Setanimation trouble
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

OOOOH so you mean like:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dark Karma”)) {
for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
p.setAnimation(645);
}
sM(“Welcome back Jordan!”);
yell(“Master Dark Karma has logged in”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Setanimation trouble
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“eagledude4, post:8, topic:348897”]I changed it already, this is how it looks now:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dark Karma")) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { p.setAnimation(645); sM("Welcome back Jordan!"); yell("Master Dark Karma has logged in"); } }

[quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=445270.msg3269221#msg3269221 date=1279078740]
you will have to replace set animation with whatever these crappy servers use these days
[/quote]My server uses setAnimation(i)[/quote]

The only thing inside the for loop is the set animation, the other 2 lines go outside it

Read full topic

item.title: Setanimation trouble
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You sure it’s animation? If so, simply do something like this in where you login

for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { p.setAnimation(645); }

No need for a separate method unless you use it for other things

Read full topic

item.title: Setanimation trouble
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Okay so I’m trying to have it so when I login, everyone except for me does the animation 645. This is what I got so far.

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dark Karma")) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { p.setAnimation(645); sM("Welcome back Jordan!"); yell("Master Dark Karma has logged in"); } }

I’m getting an error saying cannot find symbol setAnimation(int)

Read full topic
